Class Game

java.lang.Object
  Game

 class Game
extends java.lang.Object

Class Game - the main class of the adventure game Welcome to "Will you Cave when you Sea Danger?"!!!! It's a game that revolves around time. The player only has five minutes to exit the cave or else he/she loses and dies. :( The player comes about a sea cave on their own and mistakenly ventures into it. After fainting, the player realizes that they only have so long before the tide rolls in and drowns them. The layout of the cave is unknown to the player, but there are multiple ways to win. The player may either win by finding the shovel or eating food before trying to smash the window. The game relies on relentless determination; the rooms may seem like a maze, however things like the magical conch may help by giving clues along with room and item descriptions. There is a rock in the room of circles that once inspected, actually reveals a key that allows the player to get into the secret hallway and find the magical conch. Throughout, item commands such as drop, pick, purse, and look help a player identify general items. In specific scenarios, a player may use smash or listen in regards to an object they have, though not necessarily. Completely non-item commands include go, quit, help, back, climb, and scrape. Meanwhile commands such as inspect, conch, and eat only work in regards to specific items. Challenge tasks include the usage of a graphic along with a timer.

Author:
Tiffany Duong
